directions: Mix dressing, cilantro, and ginger in small bowl. Toss spinach, peppers, chicken, and nuts in large bowl with enough dressing mixture to coat. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Divide salad among 4 plates. Top with mango and serve.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed sliced red, yellow and green bell peppers
1 2- to 2 1/2-pound rotisserie chicken, meat torn into bite-size pieces (about 4 cups)
title: Asian Chicken Salad with Roasted Peanuts
